name: unitex-pt-br
title: Brazilian portuguese in Unitex tabular representations
description: UnitexGramLab sources of pt-BR dictionary adapted to Frictionlessdata.io standards for interoperability.

fields.name: letter_pair
fields.description: A pair of upper-lower case letters (or other valid symbols) used to express portuguese words

fields.name: group
fields.description: A sequence (secondary order) of equivalent-order letters

resources.name: DELAS.csv
resources.title: Dictionary of the Brazilain Portuguese Simple Words

fields.name: canonical_form
fields.description: The canonic form of a set of inflected variatns

fields.name: graph_id
fields.description: The Unitex Graph of inflections, that generates all final forms of simple words

resources.name: DELACF.csv
resources.title: Dictionary of Compound Words of Brazilian Portuguese

fields.name: form
fields.description: The plural form of a composed variant

fields.name: canonical_form
fields.description: The singular form of a composed variant

fields.name: classification
fields.description: The lemma morphological classification in the Unitex conventions
